short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: REFang copies defanged strings and replaces the defanged content to produce usable URLs, IPs and other indicators.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: REFang is aimed to help malware analysts and researchers who are actively analyzing online reports which include defanged indicators. The extension copies defanged strings and replaces the defanged content to produce usable URLs, IPs and other indicators. The refanged content is stored within the clipboard, so the analyst can use the value within additional online services or within their own local applications.
